site.title: The Horror, the horror...
site.description:
Nachrichten von einem dunklen Ort tief im nirgendwo, flussaufw√§rts ins Nichts.
  
Tales from a dark dark place in a country far far away, travelling up a long long river into nowhere...

 _Disclaimer: This is not something crazy, fucked up, creepy thing. 
 It is a display of thoughts and feelings without any consequences. It is merely meant to sanitise my own brain._
